entities.description: Usage of prescription pain relievers despite causing long-lasting or repeated health problems.
Long-lasting or repeated problems with emotions or mental health caused or worsened by prescription pain reliever usage.
Usage of prescription pain relievers despite causing long-lasting or repeated physical health problems.
Specific response from the survey participant, coded from 1 to 99 to indicate various responses.

relationships.description: Indicates if the respondent uses prescription pain relievers.
Indicates if the respondent experienced emotional or mental health problems due to prescription pain relievers.
Indicates if the respondent experienced physical health problems due to prescription pain relievers.
Indicates the coded survey response provided by the respondent.
